page.title: 15Shopping 3
page.content: The village pub is called the Black Bull. It sells Stones Beer, pies, chips and other simple meals, snacks such as crisps and peanuts and other kinds of alcoholic drinks such as wines and spirits. It has a beer garden at the back for families to use. Children under 14 are not allowed inside a pub.No one under 18 is allowed to buy or drink alcoholic drinks. The pub has a large car park which is often full when the pub is open despite laws against drinking and driving. The shopping centre is very small. All of the shops are within about thirty metres of each other. There is no footpath on one side of the road near Yates' and the Black Bull. This could be dangerous.
